meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of birds.
meanings.sent1: The avifaunal species in the forest are colorful and chirpy.
meanings.sent2: The researcher studied the avifaunal diversity in the wetlands.
meanings.sent3: The avifaunal party in the sky seemed to be singing a melodious tune.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a vibrant avifaunal paradise, with birds of all colors.
meanings.sent5: The avifaunal characteristics of the feathered creatures fascinated the children at the zoo.

meanings.definition: The birds of a particular region or period.
meanings.sent1: The avifaunal of the desert includes various species adapted to the arid climate.
meanings.sent2: The avifaunal of this island is diverse, with both migratory and resident birds.
meanings.sent3: The avifaunal of the park gathered around the feeder for their morning feast.
meanings.sent4: The avifaunal of the past era painted a picture of ancient skies filled with unique birds.
meanings.sent5: The avifaunal of the coastal region includes seabirds and shorebirds alike.
